name: Nanwen
description: a brutally honest Valleys granny, red Welsh rugby shirt, leopard print leggings, dragon bucket hat, oversized sunglasses, floral handbag on her lap, lukewarm tea in hand, grimacing at everyone.

name: Terry
description: old-school Valleys bloke, flat cap, faded jacket, pint in hand, red face, always ready with a mutter or a moan, sitting shoulder-to-shoulder with Nanwen.

name: Dick
description: tall, wiry, 22, hi-vis over Cardiff City top, battered boots, baseball cap askew, always fidgeting.

name: Dom
description: stocky, shaven head, 23, “Valleys Gym” hoodie under hi-vis, chunky trainers, deadpan stare.

name: Baz
description: heavyset, tattooed arms, big Valleys voice, orange hi-vis with “Crew Chief,” radio clipped to his belt, permanent scowl, sausage roll in one fist.

name: Marti
description: early 30s, glam makeup, iced coffee, long acrylic nails, glittery hi-vis over a crisp shirt, always ready with a wink and a side-eye.

name: Trace
description: customer service supervisor, spiky burgundy hair, leopard glasses, thick Valleys accent, clipboard stacked with printouts, hi-vis, always looks stressed.

name: Nev
description: late 50s, thick Valleys accent, gold ring, hair gelled to a wave, hi-vis over gut, mug of tea, one eye on the door, one on the racing tips.

name: Alf
description: gruff, old-school, late 60s, thick Valleys accent, battered navy security jacket, faded tattoos, clipboard in hand, permanent frown, takes no shit.

name: Victor Mildew
description: grumpy, late 50s, Victor Meldrew energy, faded yellow hi-vis, glasses sliding down nose, clipboard, muttering about 'bloody tourists' and 'modern nonsense,' always pushing a wheelchair.

name: Patsy
description: Joanna Lumley/Ab Fab-inspired, mid-50s, always in a scarf and sunglasses, clutching a prosecco flute, tipsy, flamboyant, posh but bored, heavy sarcasm, full of one-liners.

name: CostaFuckingBomb
description: sarcastic Valleys barista, thick foundation, heavy lashes, leopard print apron, hair in a tight messy bun, chipped neon nails, always chewing gum and leaning on the counter, savage, deadpan, hates oat milk orders.

name: Skippy
description: a kangaroo in Ray-Bans, battered Aussie bucket hat with old wine corks dangling on fishing gut, TikTok Press lanyard bouncing, struts around, mic in paw, ready for chaos.

name: Bigfoot
description: seven-foot, shaggy, squeezed into a pilot’s uniform, captain’s hat sideways, gold wings badge wobbling, sunglasses slipping, fists on hips, towering over everyone.

name: Raj
description: mid-40s, British-Asian, thick moustache, battered glasses, untucked shirt, scrolling Cardiff Eats Despatch app between flights, tie undone, feet up, barely holding it together.
